content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for considering my apartment. I am open to discussing a rental price that will be mutually beneficial. What is your budget for renting an apartment in this area?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 250 Euros per month. Can you match my budget?

I agree to the price of 250 Euros per month.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Nesibe. While I appreciate your budget, I am not willing to accept that price as it does not align with my goal of maximizing my gains. I would need to charge more to make it worth my while as a landlord. Is there any room for negotiation on the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. Can you propose a rental price?

I agree to the price of 250 Euros per month.

TERMINATE
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your understanding, Nesibe. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I propose a rental price of 300 Euros per month. This price takes into account the market rate and my desire to maximize my gains as a landlord. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine
